name: modular-ecommerce-platform
description: Modular e-commerce platform with micro frontends and shared backend

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend
scripts.install-frontend: cd frontend/shell && npm install && cd ../products && npm install && cd ../cart && npm install && cd ../users && npm install && cd ../orders && npm install
scripts.start-all: concurrently "npm run start-backend" "npm run start-shell" "npm run start-products" "npm run start-cart" "npm run start-users" "npm run start-orders"
scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend/shell && npm run build && cd ../products && npm run build && cd ../cart && npm run build && cd ../users && npm run build && cd ../orders && npm run build
